summary: Minutes from 303 Committee meeting on June 18, 1964, discussing autonomous operations, Artime's operations, Cuban exiles' assassination plans, and psyops leaflets. Also includes minutes from Special Group Meeting (5412) on April 2, 1964, discussing North Vietnam operations, SWIFT and NASTY craft, reconnaissance, U-2 overflights, infiltration/exfiltration in Cuba, political action in Chile and Zanzibar. Also includes minutes from a Meeting of 5412 Group on February 27, 1964, discussing SAC planes operations in South Vietnam, infiltration/exfiltration of Cuba, NRO activities, and political action in Kenya. Additionally includes a memorandum from February 10, 1964, regarding clandestine and covert activities against Cuba.
title: Memoranda regarding Covert Activities Against Cuba and Vietnam
